SELECT t.teacher_id as teacherId, t.name, t.sex, u.phone, t.college, GROUP_CONCAT(CONCAT(c.profession, c.class_name) SEPARATOR ',') as classes FROM teacher_info t LEFT JOIN school_user u ON t.teacher_id = u.user_id LEFT JOIN class_info c ON t.teacher_id = c.teacher_id
AND t.teacher_id LIKE CONCAT('%', #{teacherId}, '%')
AND t.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
AND t.sex = #{sex}
AND t.college LIKE CONCAT('%', #{college}, '%')
GROUP BY t.teacher_id, t.name, t.sex, u.phone, t.college ORDER BY t.teacher_id
